reqs: This class is web based. Please note, RMES courses are now coded as RES for the 2016 Winter Session.
description: Methods of watershed evaluation, land-water interactions, key aspects of hydrology, water quality and aquatic biota, land use impacts on water resources, community involvement, and integration of multiple land use activities and their cumulative impacts. Credit will be granted for only one of SOIL 515 or RMES 515.
